infos.value: Hey, Brotherrr. Are we at the fortress yet?
Almost. Once we come out of these woods.
...Seriously. Does she think this is a field trip? How annoying.
Nope, did you hear something? Just simply talking to myself.
...He's still breathing. Hey, pull yourself together.
Oh, Lord Adelard came for us...!
Please...please be care...ful. They are... Lu'Cia is...
She manages Rundall's third division, «Calorum». I've heard that she's a master marksman.
Yes, somehow. It seems only my right shoulder was shot.
I was also shot in the right shoulder...but the wound is not deep.
Could it be that Lu'Cia isn't the marksman that rumor says she is?
Well... What do we do, Brother?
We'll charge the fortress before they realize that we're here.
They attacked your comrades, did they not? If you bear any grudges toward me, shelve them for now.
Once we've liberated the fortress and our bretheren...then you may do as you wish.
Wait a moment. All units... Commander, are you taking up the assault as well!?
What? Did that Glahz always swagger in from behind or something?
Cut through this forest and take back the fortress from the Rundall forces!
